TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Isaetipan_pahikukian, title = Isaetipan_pahikukian, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isaetipan_pahikukian} }

S.FORM: Isaetipan pahikukian Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hualien ko Isaetipan pahikukian a niyaro', 1,927 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 5,066 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 25% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 1,247 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 75% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3,819 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 20%, Truku 2%, Tayal 1%, Bunun 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. O micidekay kalimelaan i niyaro' Isaetipan pahikukian hananay a niyaro'. O patirengan to faelohay a niyaro' no icowacowaay a finacadan no Pangcah/'Amis mafolaw tayni. O liklik no serayan dafdaf O lihaf no pakapalidingay pakapaliding no niyaro' a kasa'etal Pangcah/'Amis o sowal no 'Amis a sowal, o Payrang a sowal o lalowadan no niyaro' Ono pokpok a taliyok no niyaro' koni itiyaho, o mafolaway tayni ko alomanay a maro' itini tahanini, o nai Kohkoh, Cirakayan, Tafalong ato Posong a niyaro', patireng tona Isaetipan pahikukian a niyaro mangata to 20 a mihecaan. O kasadakan no lihaf "續修花蓮縣志"─族群篇 地名檢索系統

Isaetipan pahikokian Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hoalien ko Isaetipan pahikokian a niyaro', 1,927 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 5,066 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 25% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 1,247 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 75% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3,819 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 20%, Troko 2%, Tayal 1%, Bonon 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. O micidekay kalimelaan i niyaro' Isaetipan pahikokian hananay a niyaro'. O patirengan to faelohay a niyaro' no icowacowaay a finacadan no Pangcah/'Amis mafolaw tayni. O liklik no serayan dafdaf O lihaf no pakapalidingay pakapaliding no niyaro' a kasa'etal Pangcah/'Amis o sowal no 'Amis a sowal, o Payrang a sowal o lalowadan no niyaro' Ono pokpok a taliyok no niyaro' koni itiyaho, o mafolaway tayni ko alomanay a maro' itini tahanini, o nai Kohkoh, Cirakayan, Tafalong ato Posong a niyaro', patireng tona Isaetipan pahikokian a niyaro mangata to 20 a mihecaan. O kasadakan no lihaf "續修花蓮縣志"─族群篇 地名檢索系統
